name: I Picked up a Demon Lord as a Maid
nutshell:
If the big breasted demon queen was reduced to a slave, what would you do to her? Would you kill her and become humanity’s greatest hero? Or would you enslave her and enjoy the highest level of pleasure in the world? No, he doesn’t want any of that, Lin Xiao just wanted to be an unremarkable reserve hero. Black stocking long leg princess, two-faced loli saint… no one can tempt him to change his majestic ideals of eating and waiting for death! That’s why his answer was — “Demon Queen, can you quickly put on your clothes and scram on out of here?”
This thing is cancelled, fml another one
[Novel Description]

name: Jaa, Kimi no Kawari ni Korosou ka?
nutshell: The manga centers on Yūma Fujikura, a constantly bullied first year high school student. When a classmate named Ryō Ameri, nicknamed "Amelie," helps him out one day, Yūma tells him not to get any more involved, or else the bullies will target Amelie too. In response to this, Amelie only tells Yūma that he would commit murder for him if Yūma wanted.

name: Ihoujin, Dungeon ni Moguru
nutshell:
It was in 1946 that Earth learned of the existence of other worlds. As expected, many countries immediately tried to send people into the other world, hoping to obtain vital resources or mystical treasures. None of them came back.
And to be fair, Souya never expected to be one of those explorers. But here he was, accepting an offer by a shady company to get enough money to save his little sister. Launched into another world, he soon finds that his journey will be a hard one - not only have his teammates gone missing, but a majority of his food and weapons supply was destroyed in the transfer.
The only way left to go is forward. With only an AI companion to guide him, Souya ventures forth, hoping to find something worthwhile that will justify sending a rescue party to save him - if such a party comes at all.

Japanese WN Raws: Raw

name: Natsumichi Drive
nutshell: Michiharu is the only failing student in a highly educated family. His father tells him to go visit a relative's house to get lessons. When Michiharu visits his relative's house during summer break, his cousin Natsuki, who is rumored throughout the city for being "extremely gay" is standing there, waiting for him! Natsuki insists that not only will he teach him how to study, but he will also teach him how to play in the night…!?

name: Last Omegaverse
nutshell: It's been 100 years since the extinction of alphas and omegas. These genders now only exist in textbooks. Ayase, who was born with an "Omega mutation" in this world where only betas exist, has to labor as an AV male actor in order to secretly obtain expensive suppressants. "I would never be able to have a normal love life" is what Ayase thought, but one day, a fateful encounter with a man named Inukai left him with an uncontrollable desire. However, when they tried connecting their bodies for the first time that night, 'that' happened?!

name: Kyou Mo Musume no Nasuga Mama!
nutshell: Family life in the Izumi household.

name: Tsuyoki na Watashi no Semeta Ichinichi
nutshell:
"Today, I want to take the lead!" A normally submissive office worker tries to turn the tables on her self-assured younger girlfriend.
Oneshot from Yuri Hime's April 2021 issue (released February 2021).

name: Our Manga Club
nutshell:
Five students' lives change and intersect. It all happens in our manga club.
Author updates around every month.
Moderator's Note:
Do not report this series for not being of Asian origin, this comic is an exception due to being heavily inspired by Japanese culture and manga art styles.

name: Touhou - The World Loves Marisa (Doujinshi)
nutshell: A series of short stories showing how everybody in Gensokyo seems indeed very fond of Marisa.

name: Poetry of the Sun
tags: Official Colored,Long Strip,Martial Arts,Magic,Drama,Fantasy,Web Comic,Full Color
nutshell:
Even the brilliant rays of the sun cannot last forever. And all that’s left...

Links:
KakaoPage

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle- Anata no Yami Chinjufu (Doujinshi)
16 Engage
nutshell: Yuiko's parents passed away leaving her to start her new life with her aunt. But Shun appeared and said he is her fiancee, however at school Yukio approach a couple that are having a fight, the guy, Takami said he is going out with Yuiko. So what is the situation?

name: Kami ka Akuma ka
nutshell:
A girl who dreams of fated meetings - Kizuna. The one she met in a suspicious western-style house, the "Yuurei Library", was a good-looking but demon-like young man - Ruu. On top of that, Ruu has an unbelievable secret…! A cursed love hidden in the masterpiece "Romeo and Juliet". Searching for a new ending, the gears of fate have started to move–!?
Pt-Br:
Kizuna sonha em ter um "partner fated"(predestinado ou futuro parceiro). Em um sonho em uma biblioteca antiga, conhecida como "biblioteca fantasma", Kizuna reencontra Ruu, um jovem garoto misterioso que guarda um grande segredo e que aparece em seus sonhos frequentemente. Em cima disso um amor maldito escondido na obra "Romeu e Julieta" a procura de um novo final. As engrenadas do destino começaram a se mover. O que acontecerá com Kizuna??

name: Starting out as Friends With a Yankee Girl
nutshell: A guy fell in love at the first sight with the school #1 delinquent. He steeled himself and asked her out, but…

name: Gyakuten Saiban
nutshell: Manga based on the hit videogame series by Capcom.

name: Perfect Secret Love: The Bad New Wife Is a Little Sweet
nutshell: “How perverted is Si Ye Han’s taste? He still wants me like this?” Waking up, she looked at her reflection in the mirror: explosive wig, tattoos, and demon-like makeup. Any normal person’s eyes would burn if they looked at her for more than a second.

name: Boku no Hero Academia - G’Night, G’Morning and Good Night (Doujinshi)
nutshell: Pairing: Todoroki x Midoriya

name: Love Bite
nutshell:
It all started back in high school. Shinwoo is caught in a compromising position by his crush, Taesoo. And Taesoo doesn’t react well: “You’re dirty!” “You whore!” Cut to seven years later, and those insults have left a mark. Shinwoo can only get off on hardcore humiliation, the nastier the better. His clean-cut hunk of a boyfriend tries hard to satisfy those desires… but there’s something missing. Until Shinwoo attends his high school reunion, that is, and his first love comes back to bite him…



Original Webtoon <Mr.Blue>


Original Webtoon <MComics>


Original Webtoon <RidiBooks>


Original Webtoon <Naver>

name: I Became a Dog
nutshell: Tadashi is a kid who isn't particularly fond of dogs, but one day a peculiar circumstance makes him see through a dog's eyes.

name: Teito Monogatari
nutshell:
A visual adaptation of books 1-4 of the novel:
Vol. 1: Shinrei-hen (神霊篇, Great Spirit of Tokyo)
Vol. 2: Babylon-hen (魔都篇, Supernatural Babylon)
Vol. 3: Catastrophe-hen (大震災篇, The Great Earthquake)
Vol. 4: Ryuudou-hen (龍動篇, Movement of the Dragon)
The plot concerns a spiritual battle within Tokyo during the early 20th century.

name: Chicchai Senpai ga Kawaisugiru.
nutshell:
An ordinary run-of-the-mill guy named Takase starts working in the Sales Department of a certain Real Estate agency, and his senpai at this job, Komai, looks more like a middle school girl than an actual adult due to her height and incredible cuteness! As they grow closer together, how will they deal with this unusual situation?
(Not to be confused with My Tiny Senpai From Work, an unrelated work with a similar premise)

name: Ordeal
nutshell: Humanos são legais… Mas os kimyos são bem melhores. Kimyo: Um humano nascido com uma habilidade extraordinária que ultrapassa a evolução natural. Após o assassinato de seu mestre, Che misteriosamente recebe um talento chamado Illios, a personificação do próprio sol. Che agora caça os assassinos de seu mestre e descobre que o mundo dos talentos é muito maior do que ele e seus amigos pensam. Enquanto uma presença sombria observa todos os seus movimentos

name: The Grand Legend Ramayana
nutshell:
A Fantasy Fiction comic that inspired by a tale of Rama and Laksmana…

Official Release:

Japanese release by Digital Catapult

name: Sprout
nutshell:
Reality isn't a shoujo manga, and Miku Ikenouchi's friends know that perfectly well. But then again, they are not Miku-chan. The reason for this is that Miku-chan has a boyfriend, a third year, and is content with what she has. But then a chain of events occurs - one which leaves Miku-chan with a rival (for cuteness), her father quitting his job… and a new roommate?
((Español))
Narra la historia de Miku, fan de los mangas shoujo, que desea exprimentar un romance como los que lee cada d� a y convertirse en una chica mona. Un dia sus padres deciden que su casa se convertirá en un hospedaje, casa de alquiler, y es ahi donde la vida de Miyu cambia radicalmente, puesto que nuevas personas entran en su vida. Cómo afectará esto el noviazgo de Miyu? el manga shoujo podr� a volverse realidad?.

name: Zero no Shiniki
nutshell: Kanzaki Rei is an avid gamer, but one day he hit rock-bottom due to his debts. During the night while sleeping, a strange phenomenon happened and sent him inside the game he previously played. A world of life and death awaits.

name: The Broken Girl and the Devil's Bride
nutshell: Yue Yan was supposed to be married to God. However, the wedding was disrupted by Lan Wu Yue, and the seal of the devil was broken in the process. God split the universe in two in a fit of anger. The devil was banished and took Xue Yan with him. In the confrontation between the humans and the devil, Xue Yan got to know…
